title: Customer-Relationship-Management(CRM)
description: A full-featured Customer Relationship Management platform designed to streamline client interactions, sales tracking, and task management. It includes role-based access, real-time analytics, automated follow-ups, and an intuitive dashboard for managing leads and customer data efficiently. Built with a modern tech stack ensuring scalability, performance, and a smooth user experience.

title: QuizQuest
description: An interactive quiz application that challenges users with dynamic questions across multiple categories and difficulty levels. It features real-time scoring, progress tracking, and a responsive UI for an engaging experience. Built with a modern tech stack to ensure smooth performance, scalability, and an intuitive user interface.

title: MatchMe
description: A full-featured matchmaking platform that connects users based on personalized preferences and AI-driven compatibility scores. It includes profile creation, real-time chat, photo management, premium memberships, and behavior-based matching. With a secure backend, responsive UI, and admin analytics dashboard, MatchMe delivers a modern, scalable, and engaging user experience.

title: Traveling
description: A dynamic travel website that helps users discover destinations, explore trip packages, and plan personalized journeys with ease. It features destination search, image galleries, reviews, and responsive layouts for a seamless browsing experience. Built with modern web technologies to ensure fast performance, elegant design, and an engaging user experience.
